home.title: Brighter Tomorrow Map
home.sub_title: Connecting people going through difficult times with the free resources available, and those who want to offer support in their local community

section_titles.0: How does the Brighter Tomorrow Map work?
section_titles.1: How can i connect with people near me and offer support?

sub.0: The map is for you to list and find, all free resources available in your local community to help people who are homeless, on going through hardships to meet their basic needs, and take steps towards improving their situation
sub.1:
The map gives two options
1) Print it as a guide and give it to anyone in need
2) Post resources you'd like to offer to those in need. like a CV help workshop, teaching a skill, or just meeting for a tea and chat
sub.2: We built this map! We are an open community for taking local action, globally. Focallocal aims to hit at the very roots of issues within our societies, by simply uniting people in positive action; taking ownership of issues you want to see improved in your local community and together creating activities and projects to achieve change

section_titles.4: 5. What days and times is it open?

0.0: Not sure? Here's a list of suggestions:

sub.2: Enter address or postcode/zip - or choose from commonly used meeting points in that city, (clicking on a commonly used point auto-fills that location into the text entry box).
sub.3: Is it a group of friendly people? a charity? a religion? is it you? who are you?
sub.4: Please find accurate details, so no-one has to travel to somewhere which is closed
